channel.title: CVE Feed for Moove Agency -- Select All Categories and Taxonomies, Change Checkbox to Radio Buttons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Moove Agency -- Select All Categories and Taxonomies, Change Checkbox to Radio Buttons

item.title: CVE-2021-24287|2024-08-03T19:28:23.464Z -- moove%20agency -- select%20all%20categories%20and%20taxonomies%2C%20change%20checkbox%20to%20radio%20buttons
item.description: The settings page of the Select All Categories and Taxonomies, Change Checkbox to Radio Buttons WordPress plugin before 1.3.2 did not properly sanitise the tab parameter before outputting it back, leading to a reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue
